# reset()

**Instance Method**

Resets the default state for the vertex descriptor.

## Declaration

```swift
func reset()
```

## Discussion

After reset, each element of the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLVertexDescriptor/attributes] array has a default vertex attribute descriptor, and each element of the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLVertexDescriptor/layouts] array has a default vertex buffer layout descriptor.
title: reset()
